titles.title: Estate Taxes bill
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to double the maximum benefit under the special estate tax valuation rules for certain farm, etc., real property.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E688)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to double the maximum benefit under the special estate tax valuation rules for certain farm property and other real property.
